error.message: Class Drupal\no_nbsp\Tests\NoNbspWebTestBase extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.

Class Drupal\no_nbsp\Tests\UnitTest extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\KernelTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\KernelTests\KernelTestBase instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to no_nbsp.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
